<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"List Mobile rewards"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/helium/l2/mobile-reward-shares"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the Mobile rewards for a given time range, optionally allowing to filter by hotspot key and reward type.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"from","required":true,"description":"The beginning of the date range to retrieve rewards for."},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"to","required":true,"description":"The end of the date range to retrieve rewards for."},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"hotspot_key","description":"The hotspot key to retrieve rewards for."},{"schema":{"type":"string"},"in":"query","name":"reward_type","description":"The reward type to retrieve rewards for."},{"name":"page","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Page number for pagination (default: 1)."},{"name":"per_page","in":"query","schema":{"type":"integer"},"description":"Number of items per page (default: 25, max: 100)."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
